text:
MIT Quest for Intelligence | Full-Stack Engineer | Cambridge, MA | Onsite | Full-time | https://quest.mit.edu/

The Bridge, as part of the MIT Quest for Intelligence, is hiring the first AI engineers to help build the next generation AI and machine learning platform for campus. The goal of this project is to develop the necessary software services and infrastructure that allow AI to accelerate research and education.

More info: https://careers.peopleclick.com/careerscp/client_mit/externa...
